cards: Never have I ever fallen asleep during a movie date.
Never have I ever written a love letter.
Never have I ever had a crush on someone in this room.
Never have I ever forgotten an anniversary.
Never have I ever gone on a spontaneous road trip.
Never have I ever sung karaoke to impress someone.
Never have I ever been on a blind date.
Never have I ever texted the wrong person something romantic.
Never have I ever cried during a romantic movie.
Never have I ever planned a surprise date.
Never have I ever made up a story to impress someone.
Never have I ever gone back to an ex.
Never have I ever had a secret admirer.
Never have I ever been caught looking at someone.
Never have I ever regretted not making a move.
Never have I ever gone on a terrible first date.
Never have I ever fallen for a friend.
Never have I ever broken someone's heart.
Never have I ever kept a relationship secret.
Never have I ever stalked a crush on social media.
Never have I ever kissed on the first date.
Never have I ever dated two people at once.
Never have I ever faked being interested in someone's hobby.
Never have I ever pretended to like a gift I hated.
Never have I ever ghosted someone after a great date.
Never have I ever lied about my age on a dating app.
Never have I ever gone through my partner's phone.
Never have I ever had a workplace romance.
Never have I ever rehearsed what to say before calling someone.
Never have I ever been set up on a date by friends.
